articles.description: Conor McGregor was knocked out in the second round of his UFC return in Abu Dhabi. Manny Pacquiao believes the shock knockout is due to the fact McGregor overlooked Poirier.
articles.content:
Manny Pacquiao has accused Conor McGregor of 'underestimating' Dustin Poirier in the build-up to their UFC 257 clash.
